Doc: A type defining a content model for a calculation rule defined as percentage of the notional amount.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining a content model for a calculation rule defined as percentage of the notional amount.
 #/
record FpML5.reporting.PercentageRule {
  # A percentage of the notional amount.
  paymentPercent : decimal?

  # A reference to the notional amount.
  notionalAmountReference : FpML5.reporting.NotionalAmountReference?

}

paymentPercent.Doc: A percentage of the notional amount.
paymentPercent.Name: paymentPercent

notionalAmountReference.Doc: A reference to the notional amount.
notionalAmountReference.Name: notionalAmountReference
